statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_activity
SELECT user_id, platform FROM social_media_activity WHERE activity_type = 'like'
SELECT activity_date, activity_time FROM social_media_activity WHERE platform = 'Twitter' ORDER BY activity_date DESC, activity_time ASC
SELECT activity_description FROM social_media_activity WHERE user_id = 12345 AND activity_type = 'post' LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM social_media_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_activities > 10 ORDER BY total_activities DESC
SELECT user_id, activity_type, platform FROM social_media_activity WHERE activity_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM social_media_activity WHERE platform = 'Twitter' AND activity_type = 'Post' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users, platform FROM social_media_activity GROUP BY platform ORDER BY total_users DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT activity_type FROM social_media_activity WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-31' ORDER BY activity_type ASC;
SELECT user_id, platform, activity_date, activity_time, activity_description FROM social_media_activity WHERE platform = 'Instagram' AND activity_type = 'Like' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_activity;
SELECT user_id, platform, activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activity;
SELECT platform_name, platform_id FROM social_media_platform;
SELECT activity_type, activity_date, platform, user_id FROM user_activity;
SELECT user_id, platform, activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, platform, activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, platform, activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, platform, activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activity WHERE platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT ua.user_id, ua.platform, ua.activity_type, ua.activity_date, smp.platform_name FROM user_activity ua JOIN social_media_platform smp ON ua.platform = smp.platform_name;
SELECT DISTINCT platform, COUNT(user_id) as total_users FROM user_activity GROUP BY platform ORDER BY total_users DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_profiles LIMIT 10;
SELECT platform, COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM posts GROUP BY platform;
SELECT user_id, SUM(followers) AS total_followers FROM user_profiles GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_followers DESC;
SELECT post_text, likes, comments FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY interaction_type ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, platform FROM user_profiles ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE platform = 'Twitter' AND likes > 100 ORDER BY post_date DESC;

SELECT user_profiles.username, posts.post_text, interactions.interaction_type FROM user_profiles INNER JOIN posts ON user_profiles.user_id = posts.user_id INNER JOIN interactions ON posts.post_id = interactions.post_id WHERE user_profiles.followers > 10000 AND interactions.interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT user_profiles.username, COUNT(posts.post_id) AS total_posts, SUM(posts.likes) AS total_likes FROM user_profiles LEFT JOIN posts ON user_profiles.user_id = posts.user_id GROUP BY user_profiles.username HAVING total_posts > 5;

SELECT platform, AVG(interactions.interaction_date - posts.post_date) AS avg_response_time FROM posts INNER JOIN interactions ON posts.post_id = interactions.post_id GROUP BY platform ORDER BY avg_response_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE registration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, platform FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT post_id, post_text, post_date FROM posts WHERE post_date > '2022-05-01' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT comment_text, comment_date FROM comments WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT user_id, count(like_id) AS like_count FROM likes GROUP BY user_id HAVING like_count > 5 ORDER BY like_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, registration_date FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT post_text, platform FROM posts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_likes FROM likes GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_likes DESC;
SELECT p.post_text, c.comment_text FROM posts p JOIN comments c ON p.post_id = c.post_id WHERE p.platform = 'Instagram';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, followers_count, posts_count FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, platform, followers_count FROM user_profiles ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT post_content, likes_count, comments_count FROM post_analysis WHERE platform = 'Instagram';
SELECT platform, users_count, posts_count, total_likes, total_comments FROM platform_stats;
SELECT username, platform, followers_count FROM user_profiles WHERE platform = 'Instagram' ORDER BY followers_count DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT post_content, likes_count, comments_count FROM post_analysis WHERE platform = 'Twitter' ORDER BY post_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, engagement_type, engagement_datetime FROM engagement_history WHERE user_id = 12345 ORDER BY engagement_datetime ASC;
SELECT platform, users_count, posts_count, total_likes, total_comments FROM platform_stats WHERE users_count > 1000 ORDER BY posts_count DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT trend_type, trend_description, trend_period, trend_value FROM activity_trends WHERE trend_type = 'Hashtag' ORDER BY trend_value DESC LIMIT 5;
